Serial No..description: The unique identifier for each student

GRE Score.description: The score obtained by the student in the GRE test

TOEFL Score.description: The score obtained by the student in the TOEFL test

University Rating.description: The rating of the university that the student is applying to

SOP.description: Rating of the Statement of Purpose written by the student

value_dict.1.0: Statement of Purpose with lowest quality
value_dict.1.5: Statement of Purpose with low quality
value_dict.2.0: Statement of Purpose with below average quality
value_dict.2.5: Statement of Purpose with average quality
value_dict.3.0: Statement of Purpose with above average quality
value_dict.3.5: Statement of Purpose with high quality
value_dict.4.0: Statement of Purpose with very high quality
value_dict.4.5: Statement of Purpose with excellent quality
value_dict.5.0: Statement of Purpose with perfect quality

LOR.description: Rating of the Letter of Recommendation for the student

value_dict.1.0: Letter of Recommendation with lowest quality
value_dict.1.5: Letter of Recommendation with low quality
value_dict.2.0: Letter of Recommendation with below average quality
value_dict.2.5: Letter of Recommendation with average quality
value_dict.3.0: Letter of Recommendation with above average quality
value_dict.3.5: Letter of Recommendation with high quality
value_dict.4.0: Letter of Recommendation with very high quality
value_dict.4.5: Letter of Recommendation with excellent quality
value_dict.5.0: Letter of Recommendation with perfect quality

CGPA.description: Cumulative Grade Point Average of the student

Research.description: Whether the student has any research experience (1 for Yes, 0 for No)

value_dict.0: The student does not have any research experience

Chance of Admit.description: The probability of the student being admitted to the university

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting the chances of university admissions.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the candidate, please predict the chance of admission.
prompt.answer_prompt: The chance of admission is expected to be between 0 and 1.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting GRE scores.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the candidate, please predict the GRE score.
prompt.answer_prompt: The GRE score is expected to be between 260 and 340.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting TOEFL scores.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the candidate, please predict the TOEFL score.
prompt.answer_prompt: The TOEFL score is expected to be between 0 and 120.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting CGPA.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the candidate, please predict the CGPA.
prompt.answer_prompt: The CGPA is expected to be between 0 and 10.
